nhc_headline: ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY AND THE CAYMAN ISLANDS WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND THURSDAY...
summary:
...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY AND THE CAYMAN ISLANDS WEDNESDAY NIGHT AND THURSDAY...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Tue Jul 2
 the center of Beryl was located near 15.9, -70.8
 with movement WNW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 943 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 155 mph.
